generic: Reproduce license and legal mentions in documentation
obligations.name: License and notices in documentation
obligations.verbatim:
2. Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.

5. Due credit should be given to the OpenLDAP Project (http://www.openldap.org/).

generic: Preserve legal mentions in source code
obligations.name: Preserve License and notices in source code
obligations.verbatim: 1. Redistributions of source code must retain copyright statements and notices. Redistributions must also contain a copy of this document.

obligations.name: Respect trademarks
obligations.verbatim: 4. Products derived from this Software may not be called "OpenLDAP" nor may "OpenLDAP" appear in their names without prior written permission of the OpenLDAP Foundation.

generic: Do not use project or contributor names for endorsement or promotion.
obligations.name: No use of names for endorsment
obligations.verbatim: 3. The name "OpenLDAP" must not be used to endorse or promote products derived from this Software without prior written permission of the OpenLDAP Foundation.
